files.patch:
@@ -577,12 +577,10 @@
-  ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
-    $(eval $(call SetupTarget, build-hsdis, \
-        MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
-        TARGET := build, \
-    ))
-
-    $(eval $(call SetupTarget, install-hsdis, \
-        MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
-        TARGET := install, \
-        DEPS := jdk-image, \
-    ))
-  endif
+  $(eval $(call SetupTarget, build-hsdis, \
+      MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
+      TARGET := build, \
+  ))
+
+  $(eval $(call SetupTarget, install-hsdis, \
+      MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
+      TARGET := install, \
+      DEPS := jdk-image, \
+  ))
@@ -931,3 +929,1 @@
-    ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
-        java.base-copy: build-hsdis
-    endif
+    java.base-copy: build-hsdis

@@ -106,0 +106,4 @@
+
+# hsdis is not needed
+override HSDIS_BACKEND := none
+override ENABLE_HSDIS_BUNDLING := false

@@ -253,10 +253,2 @@
-  ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
-    HSDIS_NAME := hsdis-$(OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_LEGACY_LIB)$(SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX)
-    HSDIS_PATH := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/hsdis/$(HSDIS_NAME)
-
-    $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_HSDIS, \
-        FILES := $(HSDIS_PATH), \
-        DEST := $(call FindLibDirForModule, $(MODULE)), \
-        FLATTEN := true, \
-        MACRO := install-file-nolink, \
-    ))
+  HSDIS_NAME := hsdis-$(OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_LEGACY_LIB)$(SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX)
+  HSDIS_PATH := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/hsdis/$(HSDIS_NAME)
@@ -264,2 +256,8 @@
-    TARGETS += $(COPY_HSDIS)
-  endif
+  $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_HSDIS, \
+      FILES := $(HSDIS_PATH), \
+      DEST := $(call FindLibDirForModule, $(MODULE)), \
+      FLATTEN := true, \
+      MACRO := install-file-nolink, \
+  ))
+
+  TARGETS += $(COPY_HSDIS)
